errors.unknownLoginError: Failed to login to router. Make sure the username and password are correct.
errors.connectionError: Cannot connect to the router at {{url}}. Please make sure you are connected to the network. If the problem persists, make sure the router URL({{url}}) is correct in the app's settings.
errors.invalidRouterUrlError: Invalid router URL; {{url}}. Please set a valid URL in the app's options.
errors.emptyRouterUrlError: Router URL is empty. Please set a valid URL in the app's options.

routerModule.api_login_username_pwd_orerrun: Maximum login attempts reached. Please try again later.

home.adminOnly: Cannot view data usage while offline

delete.name: Delete
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} message(s)?

import.name: Import
import.confirm: Are you sure you want to import {{count}} message(s) from the SIM card?
import.notEnoughSpaceWarning: There is only enough space to import {{available}} message(s) out of {{count}}. Would you like to import anyways?
import.notEnoughSpaceError: Not enough space to import messages.
import.complete: Imported {{success}} message(s) successfully. Failed to import {{fail}} message(s).

markAsRead.name: Mark as read

sms.adminOnly: You must have administrator access to view SMS messages.

composeDialog.title: Message
composeDialog.characterCount: Number of characters in this message.
composeDialog.characterCountMax: The maximum number of characters per message.
composeDialog.segmentHelp: SMS messages are split up into multiple segments of {{longMax}} characters if they exceed {{normalMax}} characters.
composeDialog.remainingCharactersInSegment: The number of characters remaining in this segment.
composeDialog.messageCount: The number of segments this message will be split up into. In most cases, you will be billed for each segment.

save.notEnoughSpaceError: Not enough space to save message.

sms.boxFull: Your message box is full. To receive new messages, delete some existing ones.

services.adminOnly: You must be in administrator mode to access USSD services.

settings.adminOnly: You must be in administrator mode to change settings.
